General.Name: Swancor Advanced Materials Co Ltd
General.Description: Swancor Advanced Materials Co., Ltd. produces and sells corrosion-resistant materials, wind turbine blade materials, and new composite materials. It offers vinyl ester resin, unsaturated polyester resin, hand lay-up resin, infusion resin, adhesive for wind turbine blade, pre-preg resin, pultrusion resin for wind turbine blade girder, environmental friendly resin, rail transit safety materials, and other application series. The company's products are used in power plants, pulp plants, fertilizer plants, and steel plants; wind blades, electroplating and electrophoresis, copper smelting, seawater desalination, ship application, SMC/BMC, and waste water and gas treatment; and other non-ferrous metal, chlor alkali chemical, semiconductor electronics, food and pharmaceutical, and petrochemical industries. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
